alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued June 07 at 3:01AM MST until June 12 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 106 possible. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Yavapai county, including the Verde Valley. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
